name: majesty-baptist
description: An app to help manage Majesty Baptist Church's Songs, Bulletins, Events and other things like that (:
author: Zachiah Ryan Sawyer

scripts.build: esbuild src/electron_app/preload.ts --outfile=app/preload.js --bundle --platform=node --external:electron && elecrun build ./src/electron_app/index.ts && vite build
scripts.pack: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --win --linux
scripts.pack:all: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --win --linux --mac
scripts.pack:win: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --win
scripts.pack:mac: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --mac
scripts.pack:linux: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --linux
